UNIVERSITY OF IOWA

GLEE GLU_B_
CONCERT

"Yolu Own States University Glee Club. '
Q@\.:>o

m

(llGrinnell men and women hear the
Grinnell Glee Club every year. Would
it not be interesting to hear the State
University Glee Club this year—as a
matter of comparison as well as a
matter of enjoyment.

‘llRoscoe Patch as reader will fasci-
nate you. A Cumnock graduate and
an experienced entertainer he is a
world of fun in himself.

1

Come afteI the Class Basket Ball Game.
